Text: Home Free is the debut album by American singer-songwriter Dan Fogelberg, released in 1972 (see 1972 in music).

Text: Home Free (album):  Upon its original release "Home Free" had lukewarm success, but following a later re-issue it was certified platinum by the RIAA for certified sales of 1,000,000 copies.
